channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT8167, MT8175, MT8183, MT8362A, MT8365, MT8385
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT8167, MT8175, MT8183, MT8362A, MT8365, MT8385

item.title: CVE-2022-20026|2024-08-03T01:55:46.254Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt8167%2C%20mt8175%2C%20mt8183%2C%20mt8362a%2C%20mt8365%2C%20mt8385
item.description: In Bluetooth, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06126827; Issue ID: ALPS06126827.
